languages.text: {n}Худая рука поднимается, преграждая вам путь, и ваш вокс-приемник заходится в болезненном вое, а машинная экипировка начинает искрить. Сверкающий силовой топор техножреца изрыгает облако благословенных искр, а визор яростно сияет голубым и зеленым.{/n} "Бегите, ибо я — смерть".

{n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."
languages.original_text: {n}Худая рука поднимается, преграждая вам путь, и ваш вокс-приемник заходится в болезненном вое, а машинная экипировка начинает искрить. Сверкающий силовой топор техножреца изрыгает облако благословенных искр, а визор яростно сияет голубым и зеленым.{/n} "Бегите, ибо я — смерть".

traits.locale_text: {n}His gaunt hand raises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor flares with blue and green flames.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

{n}His gaunt hand raises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor flares with blue and green flames.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

{n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

{n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

{n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

languages.text: {n}Als er seine hagere Hand hebt, um dich aufzuhalten, heult dein Vox vor Schmerz auf und deine Maschinenausrüstung beginnt zu knistern. Die gleißende Energieaxt des Techpriesters erzeugt eine Wolke rechtschaffener Funken, während sein Visor bedrohlich blau und grün erstrahlt.{/n} "Flieht, denn ich bin der Tod."
languages.original_text: {n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als er seine hagere Hand hebt, um dich aufzuhalten, heult dein Vox vor Schmerz auf und deine Maschinenausrüstung beginnt zu knistern. Die gleißende Energieaxt des Techpriesters erzeugt eine Wolke rechtschaffener Funken, während sein Visor bedrohlich blau und grün erstrahlt.{/n} "Flieht, denn ich bin der Tod."

languages.text: {n}Il lève une main décharnée pour vous arrêter et votre vox se met immédiatement à hurler de douleur, tandis que votre équipement mécanique se met à crépiter. La hache énergétique flamboyante du technoprêtre projette une nuée d'étincelles vertueuses et sa visière émet une lueur bleu-vert menaçante.{/n} « Fuyez, car je suis la mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il lève une main décharnée pour vous arrêter et votre vox se met immédiatement à hurler de douleur, tandis que votre équipement mécanique se met à crépiter. La hache énergétique flamboyante du technoprêtre projette une nuée d'étincelles vertueuses et sa visière émet une lueur bleu-vert menaçante.{/n} « Fuyez, car je suis la mort. »

languages.text: {n}他抬起了瘦弱的手，阻止你前进。随后，你的音阵装置传来了痛苦的嚎叫声，机械设备也开始噼啪作响。眼前的技术神甫手中炽热的能量斧喷出一团正义的火花，面甲闪烁着蓝色与绿色的光芒，充满了威胁的意味。{/n}“快逃吧，因为我就是死亡的化身。”
languages.original_text: {n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

traits.locale_text: {n}他抬起了瘦弱的手，阻止你前进。随后，你的音阵装置传来了痛苦的嚎叫声，机械设备也开始噼啪作响。眼前的技术祭司手中炽热的能量斧喷出一团正义的火花，面甲闪烁着蓝色与绿色的光芒，充满了威胁的意味。{/n}“快逃吧，因为我就是死亡的化身。”

languages.text: {n}彼がやつれた手を上げてあなたを止めようとした瞬間、あなたのヴォクスが痛みに吠えるような音を立て、機械装備にひびが入り始めた。技術司祭の焼けるようなパワーアックスが火花を吹き出し、彼のバイザーが威嚇するかのように青や緑に発光した。{/n}「お逃げなさい。私は死である」
languages.original_text: {n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼がやつれた手を上げてあなたを止めようとした瞬間、あなたのヴォクスが痛みに吠えるような音を立て、機械装備にひびが入り始めた。技術司祭の焼けるようなパワーアックスが火花を吹き出し、彼のバイザーが威嚇するかのように青や緑に発光した。{/n}「お逃げなさい。私は死である」

languages.text: {n}Alza su mano enjuta para detenerte, e inmediatamente tu voco aúlla de dolor mientras que tu equipo de máquinas empieza a crepitar. El hacha de energía del tecnosacerdote desprende un aluvión de chispas y su visor se ilumina con llamas azules y verdes.{/n} «Huya, pues yo soy la muerte».
languages.original_text: {n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alza su mano enjuta para detenerte, e inmediatamente tu voco aúlla de dolor mientras que tu equipo de máquinas empieza a crepitar. El hacha de energía del tecnosacerdote desprende un aluvión de chispas y su visor se ilumina con llamas azules y verdes.{/n} «Huya, pues yo soy la muerte».

languages.original_text: {n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

languages.text: {n}Seni durdurmak için kemikleri sayılan elini kaldırdığı anda voksundan acı dolu bir feryat yükseliyor ve makine ekipmanların çatırdamaya başlıyor. Tekno Rahip'in alev alev yanan güç baltası, bir kıvılcım bulutu saçıyor ve vizörü tehditkâr bir görüntüyle mavi ve yeşil renkte parlıyor.{/n} "Kaç, zira ben ölümüm."
languages.original_text: {n}His gaunt hand rises to stop you, and immediately your vox howls in pain and your machine equipment starts crackling. The Tech-Priest's blazing power axe disgorges a cloud of righteous sparks, and his visor glows menacingly in blue and green.{/n} "Flee, for I am death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seni durdurmak için kemikleri sayılan elini kaldırdığı anda voksundan acı dolu bir feryat yükseliyor ve makine ekipmanların çatırdamaya başlıyor. Tekno Rahip'in alev alev yanan güç baltası, bir kıvılcım bulutu saçıyor ve vizörü tehditkâr bir görüntüyle mavi ve yeşil renkte parlıyor.{/n} "Kaç, zira ben ölümüm."
